analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/22/0x3c83129d5eb5df2006c9b3d39841bd3a2bb6ebfd.sol):
	External calls:
	- token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/22/0x3c83129d5eb5df2006c9b3d39841bd3a2bb6ebfd.sol)
	- token.transferOwnership(beneficiary) (/unique_chucks/22/0x3c83129d5eb5df2006c9b3d39841bd3a2bb6ebfd.sol)

	- crowdsaleFinished (/unique_chucks/22/0x3c83129d5eb5df2006c9b3d39841bd3a2bb6ebfd.sol)

Crowdsale.purchase (/unique_chucks/22/0x3c83129d5eb5df2006c9b3d39841bd3a2bb6ebfd.sol#324-326) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(msg.sender,amount) (/unique_chucks/22/0x3c83129d5eb5df2006c9b3d39841bd3a2bb6ebfd.sol)

Crowdsale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/22/0x3c83129d5eb5df2006c9b3d39841bd3a2bb6ebfd.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/22/0x3c83129d5eb5df2006c9b3d39841bd3a2bb6ebfd.sol)
